AUDIO_QUIET.description: Query whether or not quiet mode is enabled

AUDIO_QUIET^<EnableStatus>.description: Specify whether or not quiet mode is enabled

COMMS_PROTOCOL.description: Query the revision level of the communications protocol in use

COMMS_RESPONSE_MAX.description: Query maximum syringe pump communications response time.

DISPLAY_ILLUM^<DisplayIlluminationLevel>.description: Set display illumination to specified level

DRUG_LIB^<DrugNo>.description: Query details of specified drug / Query number of drugs defined.

DRUG_LIB_BOLUS^<DrugName>.description: Query drug bolus configuration of a specified drug.

DRUG_LIB_BOLUS^<DrugName>^<DrugBolusVolu.description: Configure drug bolus values of a specified drug.

DRUG_LIB_CONC^<DrugName>.description: Query concentration configuration of specified drug.

DRUG_LIB_CONC^<DrugName>^<DrugBolusVolum.description: Configure concentration values of specified drug.

DRUG_LIB_DOSE_RATE^<DrugName>.description: Query dose rate configuration of specified drug.

DRUG_LIB_DOSE_RATE^<DrugName>^<DoseRateM.description: Configure dose rate values for specified drug.

DRUG_LIB_ENABLE^<DrugName>.description: Query whether or not specified drug is enabled.

DRUG_LIB_NUMDRUGS.description: Query numbers of drugs defined and enabled in drug library.

DRUG_LIB_OCCLN_ALARM^<DrugName>.description: Query the occlusion alarm setting of a specified drug.

DRUG_LIB_OCCLN_ALARM^<DrugName>^<DrugOcc.description: Configure the occlusion alarm setting of a specified drug, including specification of whether or not the alarm level shall be used.

DRUG_SERVICES.description: Query the level of drug-related services supported by the syringe pump

INF.description:
Query current infusion status
Syringe pump serial no.
Alarm / Event status
Current infusion mode
The rate at which fluid is currently being delivered (n.b. not the same as the infusion 'set' rate).
Current drug name
Volume infused
Current line pressure
Infusion time remaining
ID of latest event log entry.

INF_BACKOFF.description: Query whether or not backoff is enabled

INF_BOLUS.description: Query if bolus is enabled or disabled. See note 21 for TIVA information.

INF_BOLUS^<EnableStatus>.description: Specify whether bolus is or is not enabled

INF_HANDSFREE.description: Query whether Handsfree is enabled or not

INF_KVO.description: Query whether or not KVO delivery is enabled

INF_MANUALBOLUS.description: Query whether Manual Bolus is enabled or not

INF_PURGE_PRIME_SYRINGE.description: Query whether or not syringe/set priming is enabled

INF_RATE_ACHIEVABLE.description: Query whether set infusion rate is achievable

INF_RATE_MAX_SYRINGE.description: Query maximum infusion rate that is permitted for the currently confirmed syringe. Note that this rate may be higher than the syringe pump itself can support.

INF_TITRATE.description: Query whether or not titration is enabled

INF_VI_CLEAR_CTRL.description: Enable / disable VI clearing from syringe pump keypad

INF_VI_CLEAR_CTRL^<EnableStatus>.description: Enable / disable VI clearing from syringe pump keypad

INF_VTBI.description: Query volume remaining to be infused

INF_VTBI^<ActivationStatus>^<VolumeValue.description: Query volume remaining to be infused

INF_VTBI_CLEAR.description: Query whether or not VTBI is to be cleared after infusion

INF_VTBI_CLEAR^<ActivationStatus>.description: Query whether or not VTBI is to be cleared after infusion

INST_NAME.description: Query the name of the syringe pump

INST_SWVER^<ProgComponentID>.description: Query main processor software version of specified programmable component

LOG_NUM_RECORDS^<LogType>.description: Query number of logged records by type

LOG_USER_ACCESS^<LogType>.description: Query user access by log type

LOG_USER_ACCESS^<LogType>^<EnableStatus>.description: Specify whether or not user access is enabled

NURSE_MODFIT.description: Query whether or not module is fitted

NURSE_MODFIT^<FitStatus>.description: Specify whether or not module is fitted

NURSE_STATUS^<ActivationStatus>.description: Specify required state of nurse call

PATIENT_SERVICES.description: Query patient-related services supported by syringe pump in use

PLNGRDRV_NEOI.description: Query near end of infusion point

PLNGRDRV_NEOI^<TimeValue>^<TimeUnits>.description: Set near end of infusion point

PLNGRDRV_PLNGRPOSN_CALPT^<CalPtNo>.description: Query plunger position sensor calibration value

POWER_BAT_VDQ.description: Query whether current voltage diagnostics are available

POWER_MAINS.description: Query status of AC mains supply

POWER_MAINS_ALARM.description: Query whether mains failure alarm is enabled

POWER_MAINS_ALARM^<EnableStatus>.description: Specify whether mains failure alarm is enabled

PRESSURE.description: Query current pressure (based on whichever sensor reading is currently being used)

PRESSURE_AUTO_SET.description: Query whether Auto Set is enabled or disabled

PRESSURE_AUTO_SET^<EnableStatus>.description: Set whether Auto Set is enabled or disabled

PRESSURE_DISC.description: Query current line pressure reading and disc fitment status

PRESSURE_DISC_CALPT^<CalPtNo>.description: Query line pressure sensor calibration value

PRESSURE_DISPLAY.description: Query whether pressure display is or is not enabled

PRESSURE_DISPLAY^<EnableStatus>.description: Set whether pressure display is or is not enabled

PRESSURE_LEVEL_CAP.description: Query the pressure level cap setting (GH only)

PRESSURE_LEVEL_CAP^<PressureLevel>.description: Set the pressure level cap setting (GH only)

PRESSURE_LINE_DISCONNECT.description: Query whether line disconnection alarm is or is not enabled

PRESSURE_LINE_DISCONNECT^<EnableStatus>.description: Set whether line disconnection alarm is or is not enabled

PRESSURE_OAL^<PressureLevel>.description: Set occlusion alarm level – using pressure level

PRESSURE_OAL^<PressureValue>^<PressureUn.description: Set occlusion alarm level – using pressure value

PRESSURE_OAL_AUTO.description: Query whether auto pressure setting is or is not enabled

PRESSURE_OAL_AUTO^<EnableStatus>.description: Enable / disable whether auto pressure setting is or is not enabled

PRESSURE_OAL_DFLT.description: Query default occlusion alarm level – no pressure sensor fitted

PRESSURE_OAL_DFLT^<PressureLevel>.description: Query default occlusion alarm level – no pressure sensor fitted

PRESSURE_OAL_DFLT^<PressureValue>^<Press.description: Query default occlusion alarm level – no pressure sensor fitted

REMOTE_CFG.description: Query remote configuration status and revision timeout.

REMOTE_CTRL.description: Query remote control status and reversion timeout.

REMQUERY.description: Query activation status of remote query.

RTC.description: Query current real time clock value

SYRFORCE_CALPT^<CalPtNo>.description: Query syringe force sensor calibration value

SYRINGE_BRAND.description: Query whether or not specified brand of syringe is enabled and selected.

SYRINGE_BRAND^<SyrBrand>^<EnableStatus>.description: Disable specified brand of syringe OR Enable specified brand of syringe without selecting it.

SYRINGE_BRAND^<SyrBrand>^<EnableStatus>^.description: Enable and select specified brand of syringe.

SYRINGE_BRAND_NAME.description: Query name of specified brand and number of brand available.

SYRINGE_CLAMP_CALPT.description: Query syringe clamp sensor calibration value.

SYRINGE_CONFIRM.description: Query whether or not syringe is confirmed.

SYRINGE_CONFIRMABLE.description: Query whether or not syringe can be confirmed.

SYRINGE_COVER.description: Query whether or not syringe cover is closed.

SYRINGE_COVER_FIT.description: Query whether or not cover is fitted.

SYRINGE_COVER_FIT^<FitStatus>.description: Specify whether or not cover is fitted.

SYRINGE_MODEL.description: Query whether or not specified model of syringe is enabled.

SYRINGE_MODEL^<SyrBrand>^<SyrModel>^<Ena.description: Enable / disable and select / de-select specified model of syringe.

SYRINGE_MODEL_NAME.description: Query name of model within specified brand and number available.

<AlarmCode>.description: Identifies the nature of an alarm in language-independent manner

<AlarmNature>.description: A description of the nature of an alarm

<AlarmNotification>.description: This code enables rapid reporting that something significant has happened to or within the syringe pump, i.e. sufficient to warrant further interrogation.

<AlarmOrigin>.description: A description of the origin of the alarm

<CalNumPts>.description: The number of points in a given calibration procedure.

<CalPtNo>.description:
A number that uniquely identifies a calibration point within a series of calibration points, where, for the calibration series:
0 <= <CalPtNo> < <CalNumPts>

<CalStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not calibration is valid.

<CommsProtocolID>.description: Specifies the revision identifier of the communications protocol that is supported by the syringe pump.

<CommsSecurityCode>.description: A character sequence containing a code that is used as a protection mechanism.

<RTC_DateAndTime>.description: Specifies a date and time retrieved from or used to set a clock

<AmountValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies an amount of a drug.

<AmountUnits>.description: The units associated with a drug amount.

<DrugBolusRateDfltValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies the bolus rate that is used if such a value is not explicitly specified by the user.

<DrugBolusVolume>.description: A numerical value that specifies the bolus rate that is used if such a value is not explicitly specified by the user.

<ConcDfltValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies the concentration that shall be used if such a value is not explicitly specified by the user.

<ConcMaxValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies the highest acceptable drug concentration.

<ConcMinValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies the lowest acceptable drug concentration.

<ConcUnits>.description: The units associated with a drug concentration.

<ConcValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies a drug concentration.

<DoseRateDfltValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies the dose rate that is used if such a value is not explicitly specified by the user.

<DoseRateMaxValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies the highest acceptable dose rate.

<DoseRateMinValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies the lowest acceptable dose rate.

<DoseRateUnits>.description: The units associated with a drug dose rate.

<DoseRateValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a drug dose rate

<DrugOcclusionPressure>.description: Specifies the occlusion alarm pressure to be used when delivering the drug

<DrugServiceLevel>.description: Identifies the level of drug functionality supported by the syringe pump

<NumDrugsDefined>.description: The number of drugs currently defined in the drug library

<NumDrugsEnabled>.description: The number of drugs currently defined in the drug library

<ActivationStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not something is activated

<AvailabilityStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not something is available

<ClosureStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not something is closed

<EnableStatus>.description: Specifies whether something is enabled or disabled

<FitStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not something is fitted

<PermitStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not something is permitted

<ProportionUnits>.description: The units associated with a proportion

<ProportionValue>.description: The numeric value associated with a proportion

<RelayCoilStatus>.description: Specifies the status of the coil of a relay

<ResponseTimeUnits>.description: The units associated with a response time

<ResponseTimeValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a response time

<SelectStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not something is selected.

<SuccessStatus>.description: Specifies the result of a test.

<TimeoutUnits>.description: The units associated with a timeout.

<TimeoutValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a timeout.

<DisplayIlluminationLevel>.description: Specifies a display backlight illumination level.

<BolusRateUnits>.description: The units associated with a bolus rate.

<BolusRateDfltValue>.description: A numerical value that specifies the bolus rate that is used if such a value is not explicitly specified by the user.

<BolusRateValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a bolus rate.

<BolusVolumeLimitValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a bolus volume limit.

<InductionAmount>.description: The numerical value associated with an induction.

<InductionUnits>.description: The units associated with an infusion rate.

<InductionTime>.description: The units associated with an induction time.

<MaintenanceRate>.description: The units associated with a Maintenance rate.

<MaintenanceRateUnits>.description: The units associated with a Maintenance rate.

<PauseAfterInduction>.description: The Boolean associated with a pause after induction.

<InfusionRateUnits>.description: The units associated with an infusion rate.

<InfusionRateValue>.description: The numerical value associated with an infusion rate.

<InfusionTimeRemaining>.description: Specifies the time remaining before the current infusion reaches its End Of Infusion point.

<PurgeRateUnits>.description: The units associated with a purge rate.

<PurgeRateValue>.description: A numerical value associated with a purge rate.

<Vl_Units>.description: The units associated with Volume Infused.

<Vl_Value>.description: The numerical value associated with Volume Infused.

<VTBI_EndAction>.description: Specifies the action taken when VTBI completion occurs.

<HospName>.description: The name of the hospital that owns or uses the syringe pump.

<InstModelIdentifier>.description: Identifies the specific syringe pump model variant.

<ManufacturerName>.description: Identifies the name of the syringe pump manufacturer.

<ProgComponentID>.description: Uniquely identifies a programmable component within a syringe pump.

<ServiceDate>.description: Specifies a date associated with servicing of a syringe pump.

<ServiceMessage>.description: A user-specified message to be displayed when servicing is required.

<UnitReference>.description: A means of syringe pump identification that is provided by the user.

<UsageSinceColdStartValue>.description: The numerical value of a time relating to usage since the unit was last cold-started.

<UsageSinceUseMonResetValue>.description: The numerical value of a time relating to usage since the user usage monitor was last reset.

<UsageUnits>.description: The units associated with a usage parameter.

<VersionID>.description: Uniquely identifies a version of a specific component within a syringe pump.

<KeyName>.description: Identifies a specific key on the keypad.

<PressStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not a key is pressed.

<LatestLogEntryID>.description: The unique identification code associated with the most recent entry in a specified log.

<LogEntryDescription>.description: Details of a recorded log entry.

<LogEntryID>.description: Uniquely identifies a log entry within a syringe pump.

<LogEntryMnemonic>.description: Identifies the nature of a logging entry in a language-independent manner.

<LogTimeStamp>.description: Specifies the time at which an entry was made in the log.

<LogType>.description: Identifies the log that is being handled by a logging command.

<MaxNumLoggedRecords>.description: Specifies the maximum number of log records that can be accommodated.

<MotorTestStatus>.description: Specifies what state the motor test is in.

<NurseCallMode>.description: Specifies action required to call nurse.

<PatientServiceLevel>.description: Identifies the level of patient management services provided by the syringe pump in use.

<AngleUnits>.description: The units associated with an angle.

<AngleValue>.description: The numerical value of an angle.

<BatChargeUnits>.description: The units associated with a battery charge quantity.

<BatChargeValue>.description: The numerical value of a battery charge quantity.

<CurrentUnits>.description: The units associated with a current.

<CurrentValue>.description: The numerical value of a current

<DiamUnits>.description: The units associated with a diameter

<DiamValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a diameter

<DistanceUnits>.description: The units associated with a distance

<DistanceValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a diameter

<ForceUnits>.description: The units associated with a force

<ForceValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a force

<PressureLevel>.description: Specifies a pressure in terms of its bargraph level

<PressureUnits>.description: The units associated with a pressure

<PressureValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a pressure

<TimeUnits>.description: The units associated with a time

<TimeValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a time

<VoltageUnits>.description: The units associated with a voltage

<VoltageValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a voltage

<VolumeUnits>.description: The units associated with a volume

<VolumeValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a time

<WeightUnits>.description: The units associated with a voltage

<WeightValue>.description: The numerical value associated with a time

<MainsStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not AC mains is connected.

<RemQueryOptionA>.description: Text displayed as part of a remote query – Option A.

<RemQueryOptionB>.description: Text displayed as part of a remote query – Option B.

<RemQueryResult>.description: Text that is identical to the remote query option text associated with the user's selection.

<SensorCurrentUnits>.description: The units associated with the current flowing through a sensor.

<SensorCurrentValue>.description: The numerical value associated with the current flowing through a sensor.

<SensorOffsetVoltageUnits>.description: The units associated with the offset voltage output from a sensor.

<SensorOffsetVoltageValue>.description: The numerical value associated with the offset voltage output from a sensor.

<SensorVoltageUnits>.description: The units associated with the voltage output from a sensor.

<SensorVoltageValue>.description: The numerical value associated with the output from a sensor.

<SyrBrand>.description: The name of the brand of a syringe.

<SyrBrandNo>.description: The index number of a syringe brand within a series, where 0 <= <SyrBrandNo> <= <SyrNumBrands>.

<SyrConfirmStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not a syringe is (or can be) confirmed.

<SyrModel>.description: The name of a model of a syringe.

<SyrModelNo>.description: The index number of a syringe model within a series, where 0 <= <SyrModelNo> <= <SyrNumModels>.

<SyrNumBrands>.description: The number of syringe brands available.

<SyrNumModels>.description: The number of syringe brands available within a specified brand.

<SyrRecognitionStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not a syringe is recognised.

<DrvEngStatus>.description: Specifies whether or not the drive is currently engaged or disengaged

<PlngrPosnUnits>.description: The units associated with a plunger position

<PlngrPosnValue>.description: The numerical value of a plunger position

<VSI_Name>.description: Identifies a specific visual status indicator
